original_title: Alarming increase of kidney patients in Sri Lanka, doctor warns
original_body_lines: Nephrologist Dr. Anura Hewageegana says that there is an alarming increase in kidney patients identified in Sri Lanka.
Dr. Hewageegana made this remark while joining a press briefing held in Colombo yesterday (March 09).
Furthermore, he mentioned that a significant increase in the number of kidney patients reported in agricultural areas is currently being observed.
